content: I don't seem to have the ability to merge PRs or push to branches on rust-lang/libm, could someone update the permissions?
You may be able to open a PR against the teams repo to give you access

I don't think we've implemented repo permissions into teams yet, though I'd like to.

I've added the libs team to the libm repo for now though, which seems right, so you should have access @Amanieu
Ah, I was wondering why I didn't have repo permissions for https://github.com/rust-lang/project-portable-simd, ha.
